action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a laundry room with two front-loading washing machines and dryers side by side. The room has light blue walls, white cabinets above the machines, and a brown countertop. The floor is tiled, and there is a white door on the left.

ANSWER: The image shows a laundry room with two front-loading washing machines and dryers side by side. The room has light blue walls, white cabinets above the machines, and a brown countertop. The floor is tiled
action.label: response

action.content:

answer: the image shows a laundry room with two front-loading washing machines and dryers side by side. the room has light blue walls, white cabinets above the machines, and a brown countertop. the floor is tiled
